migrations.description: Add @nrwl/cli as dependency
migrations.name: add-cli-dependency

migrations.description: Update typescript to v4
migrations.name: update-10-3-0

migrations.description: Adds .vscode/extensions.json to a workspace
migrations.name: add-vscode-extensions

migrations.description: Adds `buildableProjectDepsInPackageJsonType` for web and angular package builders
migrations.name: add-buildable-project-deps-in-package-json-type

migrations.description: Add an explicit dependency on @nrwl/tao
migrations.name: add-explicit-dep-on-tao

migrations.description: Update the 'update' npm script to invoke nx migrate
migrations.name: update-script-to-invoke-nx-migrate

migrations.description: Update the decoration script when using Angular CLI
migrations.name: update-decorate-angular-cli

migrations.description: Update the @types/node package
migrations.name: update-node-types

migrations.description: Rename tools/schematics into tools/generators
migrations.name: rename-workspace-schematics

migrations.description: Adds `outputs` based on builders
migrations.name: add-outputs-in-workspace

migrations.description: Check that the right update command is used
migrations.name: update-command-check

migrations.description: Rename the workspace-schematic script into workspace-generator script
migrations.name: rename-workspace-schematic-script

migrations.description: Rename the workspace-schematic script into workspace-generator script
migrations.name: add-target-dependencies

migrations.description: Removing "Solution Style" TypeScript configuration file support.
migrations.name: remove-solution-style-tsconfig

migrations.description: Replace deprecated library builder '@angular-devkit/build-ng-packagr'.
migrations.name: replace-ng-packagr-builder

migrations.description: Add 'declarationMap' compiler options for non production library builds.
migrations.name: add-declaration-map-compiler-option

migrations.description: Remove deprecated options from 'angular.json' that are no longer present in v11.
migrations.name: update-angular-config-v11

migrations.description: Update workspace dependencies to match a new v11 project.
migrations.name: update-workspace-dependencies-v11

migrations.description: Remove deprecated options from 'angular.json' that are no longer present in v12.
migrations.name: update-angular-config-v12

migrations.description: Update 'zone.js' to version 0.11.x. Read more about this here: https://github.com/angular/angular/blob/master/packages/zone.js/CHANGELOG.md#breaking-changes-since-zonejs-v0111
migrations.name: update-zonejs

migrations.description: Remove 'emitDecoratorMetadata' TypeScript compiler option. Decorator metadata is no longer needed by Angular. Read more about this here: https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/decorators.html#metadata
migrations.name: remove-emit-decorator-metadata

migrations.description: Lazy loading syntax migration. Update lazy loading string syntax to use dynamic imports.
migrations.name: lazy-loading-string-syntax

migrations.description: Remove deprecated ViewEngine-based i18n build and extract options. Options present in the configuration will be converted to use non-deprecated options.
migrations.name: remove-deprecated-i18n-options

migrations.description: Updates Web Worker consumer usage to use the new syntax supported directly by Webpack 5.
migrations.name: update-web-workers-webpack-5

migrations.description: Remove invalid 'skipTests' option in '@schematics/angular:module' Angular schematic options.
migrations.name: schematic-options-12

migrations.description: Replace the deprecated '--prod' in package.json scripts.
migrations.name: replace-deprecated-prod-flag

migrations.description: Upgrade NgRx libraries to version 10.0.0
migrations.name: update-10-2-0

migrations.description: Add tsconfig.editor.json to angular apps and update jest-angular-preset
migrations.name: update-10-3-0

migrations.description: Adjust karma and protractor setup
migrations.name: update-10-4-0

migrations.description: Update eslint config and builder to extend from new Nx Angular presets and lint templates
migrations.name: add-template-support-and-presets-to-eslint

migrations.description: Update builder configurations and dependencies
migrations.name: update-11-0-0

migrations.description: adjusts the ngcc postinstall command to just leave 'ngcc' in there. This fixes Ivy in Jest tests and Storybooks
migrations.name: update-ngcc-postinstall

migrations.description: Remove deprecated options and update others according to new defaults. It syncs with the v12 migration of Angular builders.
migrations.name: update-webpack-browser-config

migrations.description: Updates storybook configurations to support webpack 5
migrations.name: update-storybook

migrations.description: Migrates some rules that have changed in Angular EsLint
migrations.name: update-angular-eslint-rules

migrations.description: Convert targets using @nrwl/angular:webpack-browser with the buildTarget option set to use the @nrwl/angular:delegate-build executor instead.
migrations.name: convert-webpack-browser-build-target-to-delegate-build

migrations.description: NavigationExtras omissions migration. In version 11, some unsupported properties were omitted from the `extras` parameter of the `Router.navigateByUrl` and `Router.createUrlTree` methods.
migrations.name: migration-v11-navigation-extras-omissions

migrations.description:
The default value for `relativeLinkResolution` is changing from 'legacy' to 'corrected'.
This migration updates `RouterModule` configurations that use the default value to 
now specifically use 'legacy' to prevent breakages when updating.
migrations.name: migration-v11-router-relative-link-resolution-default

migrations.description: In Angular version 11, the type of `AbstractControl.parent` can be `null` to reflect the runtime value more accurately. This migration automatically adds non-null assertions to existing accesses of the `parent` property on types like `FormControl`, `FormArray` and `FormGroup`.
migrations.name: migration-v11-abstract-control-parent

migrations.description: ViewEncapsulation.Native has been removed as of Angular version 11. This migration replaces any usages with ViewEncapsulation.ShadowDom.
migrations.name: migration-v11-native-view-encapsulation

migrations.description: `async` to `waitForAsync` migration. The `async` testing function has been renamed to `waitForAsync` to avoid confusion with the native `async` keyword.
migrations.name: migration-v11-wait-for-async

migrations.description: NavigationExtras.preserveQueryParams has been removed as of Angular version 11.  This migration replaces any usages with the appropriate assignment of the queryParamsHandling key.
migrations.name: migration-v11-router-preserve-query-params

migrations.description: Updates the `initialNavigation` property for `RouterModule.forRoot`.
migrations.name: migration-v11-router-initial-navigation-options

migrations.description: Removes `canActivate` from a `Route` config when `redirectTo` is also present
migrations.name: migration-v11.1-can-activate-with-redirect-to

migrations.description: In Angular version 12, the type of ActivatedRouteSnapshot.fragment is nullable. This migration automatically adds non-null assertions to it.
migrations.name: migration-v12-activated-route-snapshot-fragment

migrations.description: `XhrFactory` has been moved from `@angular/common/http` to `@angular/common`.
migrations.name: migration-v12-xhr-factory

migrations.description: Automatically migrates shadow-piercing selector from `/deep/` to the recommended alternative `::ng-deep`.
migrations.name: migration-v12-deep-shadow-piercing-selector

migrations.description: Updates Angular Material to v11
migrations.name: migration-v11

migrations.description: Updates Angular Material to v12
migrations.name: migration-v12

migrations.description: Remove deprecated jest builder options
migrations.name: update-10.2.0

migrations.description: Adds all jest projects into the root jest config
migrations.name: update-projects-property

migrations.description: Fix ts-jest migration
migrations.name: update-ts-jest

migrations.description: Adds a jest extension to the recommended extensions for vscode
migrations.name: add-jest-extension

migrations.description: Update jest-preset-angular to version 8.4.0
migrations.name: update-jest-preset-angular-8-4-0

migrations.description: Replace tsConfig with tsconfig for ts-jest in jest.config.js
migrations.name: update-ts-jest-6-5-5

migrations.description: Add testEnvironment: 'jsdom' in web apps + libraries
migrations.name: support-jest-27

migrations.description: Support for Jest 27 via updating ts-jest + jest-preset-angular
migrations.name: update-ts-jest-and-jest-preset-angular

migrations.description: Uses `getJestProjects()` to populate projects array in root level `jest.config.js` file.
migrations.name: update-jest-config-to-use-util
